name: Christopher Lindsey
text: Jim is knowledgeable and really funny.  He is focused on the work. My hydraulics come here to be repaired. I wouldn't even consider going any other place.

resp.text: Thank you Chris!

name: Krash Hamilton
text: Great people that are dedicated to perfection.

name: Blake Powers
text: Price  gouging at its best!!!  They had one guy working 5 hours of wo $1900!  On top of that they were supposed to meet us at 8:00 AM on Saturday morning and showed up at 11. It cost us a whole day of work.  Save yourself by not making this mistake !  The job should’ve been $400.  I’m taking this to the better business bureau.

name: Eddie Kiser
text: Great people to have working for you. Sam was an excellent help after hours got us back going quick. No one eles will get my business while working in this area.

resp.text: Thank you.  I will tell Sam of your kind words!

name: Bill Yancy
text: Just excellent service. I left my backhoe's leaking arm cylinder here and JimPam had it ready for me in 2 days, and at a better price for new seals than I've EVER gotten. It works like brand new now, Jim's experience speaks for itself

resp.text: Thank you! I'm glad we were able to get you up and running quickly!

name: Chuck Linderman
text:
They do jobs nobody else can. The Hydraulic manifold on my Russian Belarus 250AS was in need of an overhaul. Every where I took it said trash it, buy another or wouldn't even consider attempting to rebuild it.
Jim was able to do the job for a fair price and saved me a lot of time and money. Check them out !!

resp.text: Thanks Chuck! It was a pleasure meeting you, and thank you for the comment!

name: Robyn Z
text: Excellent, friendly, professional, and very clean shop. And fast services. I won't go anywhere else for my hydraulic services. Thanks Jim your awesome!

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks so much!

name: franklin mitchell
text: Check with Jim before you buy the rebuilt kit from dealer. A friend told me about  Jimpam. Now ill tell all in need of repair where to go. Excellent  experience

resp.text: Thank you! We are usually able to buy parts, seals, etc for less than what our customers could buy the item for.  We pass that savings on to our customers.  Thanks for your review!

name: Mike Smith
text: Totally ruined a hydralic lift unit.Still to this day unable to use! Should have been told but i guess they were more into money than customer.

name: Mike S
text: Best tech in the southeast. If no one else can do it, Jim can!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to say!  We appreciate your business!

name: David Waid
text: I just want to say that if you’re looking for a great price and friendly people then  Columbiana Tractor is that place. I called and talked with Jacob and he sold me a Scag liberty. He delivered it to me which is 45 minute  drive one way . So my first cut with the mower I had a belt problem. I called Jacob and he and Terri took care of me within a hour and half. Jacob return to my house with another man and replaced the belt that day. It’s running great now. I can’t say enough about they’re customer service and Jacob and Terri . Thank all of y’all, I couldn’t be happier!!!

name: Jeff Thomas
text: Just purchased a Branson 2505h tractor from Columbiana  tractors.  Jacob, Robert, and Mike helped the process go smoothly and they were very friendly. Would recommend them to anyone needing a tractor or other equipment. Any questions don't hesitate to give them a call.

name: Danny Barton
text: Bought their smallest compact tractor last Friday... they delivered it to me on Monday... and i finally got to play on it today... I am very satisfied with its overall performance. It does everything that I was wanting it to do... except pick up the backend of a full sized van... but i think I was asking a little too much of it hahaha... i ran over brush and small trees several inches thick and the bush hog just ate them up... I looked at several different brands of tractor and finally decided to go with Branson... because they were all basically the same thing... and i got mine 7k cheaper than the big name brands...

name: John Henry
text: 100% satisfied with my Branson 2515 H tractor! Jacob up was more than helpful with me and any questions that I had! Being 20 years old buying one they didn’t turn me away or act like I wasn’t important buying on or looking around the lot. The tractor is a absolute beast for 25hp couldn’t be happier!

name: Michael Greene
text: I recently ordered a SCAG Vride 2 mower from Columbiana Tractor and had to wait a while due to Covid related shortages. During that time Terri was patient with my persistent questions and kept me up to date on my delivery day. I finally got my mower a few days ago and couldn't be happier with it. When I swing by the shop Chris always steps out to say hi and the whole crew has been a pleasure to work with. I look forward to future business with them.

name: Dwayne Bradley
text: I purchased a LS tractor, Loader, backhoe cutter and grapple from Columbiana tractor.  Jacob took care of me. Fair price and easy financing.  Great place to do business with.  The staff made sure I was completely satisfied with the purchase before they would let me leave.  They got me loaded securely.  Highly recommended!!!!!

name: W Stein
text:
I bought a Branson 2505 package from them, Great buying experience with Columbiana tractor. Jacob was more than helpful and pretty the much reason I bought a tractor package from them. Drove 6 hours total to pick it up. He was very knowledgeable and educated on the tractors and implements.
This dealer still has respect for the customers and treats them as such, can’t say enough great things about them and my experience. Will buy all my tractor and zero turn needs from them!

name: Chad Beasley
text: I am loving my new SCAG Freedom Z mower I bought from Columbiana Tractor. I've never had so much fun cutting grass. They were great to work with! Very knowledgable, no pressure, easy transaction. Terri communicated with me throughout the process and Jacob delivered and demonstrated my new toy. And this mower is an absolute beast! Such a clean, even cut. Check them out if you're anywhere near Shelby County, AL!

name: Jason Bryant
text: These guys were great to deal with.  Got the tractor i wanted for a great price.  Branson 2515h

name: Randy Dalton
text: Just a complete pleasure to deal with! Chris, Jeff, Robert, and Jacob were very honest with all my questions and very helpful with all I needed! I bought a new Scag Tiger Cat II, new trailer, and New Cushman 4 seater golf cart!!! I’m so pleased from start to finish with this team and now Family!!!

name: Todd Oden
text: Bought two pieces of equipment for our Dealership MTO Motors today from my friend Chris Mundy.   Great dealership and great folks!  5 Star service and a smooth transaction.  I highly recommend these guys.

name: Chad Jackson
text: No pressure sales staff. Small town feel. Best prices in Alabama.

name: taylor ellis
text: I purchased a 25+5 goose neck trailer in November of 2019. The buying process was easy and my sales person Justin was very helpful and friendly. I did have an issue with the title paper work being sent in by Terri but Chris (who I am guessing is the owner) reached out to me to resolve the situation.

name: Mike Raita
text: I've been to the "biggies" to have my Kubota tractor and zero turn serviced but I'm thrilled to have found the best service I've ever had just down the road at Columbiana Tractor. Friendly, thorough, conscientious, and precise - they don't push stuff you don't need. Jacob picked up and delivered when he said he would and Terri kept me informed of needs and cost throughout the process. I highly recommend my new favorite neighbors for all your mower and tractor service needs!

resp.text: We truly appreciate your business Mr.Raita. Thank you!

name: Janet Williams
text: Columbiana tractor is amazing! They helped out my boyfriend and his family that was in dire need of a lawn mower! They walked in to friendly people that greeted them with a smile, offered them some water and a free hat which my boyfriend couldn’t pass up!! Thank you Columbiana tractor for being awesome and being fast and friendly!! Highly recommend this place!!

name: Christopher Chapman
text: I had great service from the salesman Jacob he was very honest and  he made sure I got what I wanted and kept me updated on the process along the way ,also delivered my new  Branson tractor to my house and let me know the exact time he would arrive!

name: william mcleod
text: I looked at other brands but I have always liked the Branson tractors. Jacob in the sales department is a great guy easy to deal with. He answered all my questions and he met me half way to deliver the tractor because I live a 120 miles away. Mike in the finance dept. is great to deal with got me finance at the rate and time frame I wanted. This a five star  group of people to deal with very knowledgeable and helpful.I love my Branson 2505 H. Thank You for your help.

name: Brian Smith
text: Great customer service with a knowledge staff. If your in the market for a new tractor or mower they carry top notch equipment that will NOT disappoint! Customer service is second to none.

name: Phillip Gray
text:
Did a lot of research on tractors before I bought my LS  from Columbiana Tractor.
Got hooked up with Jacob and he was very responsive with emails and text. Finally got the deal worked out even got up'd from a 45HP to a 50HP for almost nothing because they sold the one we spoke about. But he came thru with still a STEAL of a DEAL. Got there met Mike, Terri and Jacob plus the owner Jeff who by the way is from my home town and about same age as me. We went to competing schools but recognized each other and had a lot of mutual friends. Jacob, Terri, Mike and Jeff were all there to congratulate me and my wife on our new purchase. Everyone was super polite! Got some great SWAG to! These folks are a pleasure to deal with have the all answers when it comes to the equipment they sell.  I gave a 4 because it will most likely go to 5 once I get the 50 hour service done then I can brag on them some more for that to. Go see my friends at Columbiana Tractor might be off the beaten path but the view getting there ain't bad! Thanks CT LLC! Oh and I am LOVING MY LS XR4150XR with TITAN 6' SLIP CLUTCH CUTTER AND DISC!!!!!

name: Jerred Pruitt
text: I bought a scag turf tiger 2 from Columbiana tractor went thru Jacob Davenport. He was very knowledgeable and very helpful with my purchase highly recommend!

name: Charles Hurst
text: I bought an incredible LS XU6168 from Columbiana Tractor and the experience was outstanding!  Chris and Jeff were great to work with.  Very low pressure, fair and upfront with everything and the tractor is amazing!  Couldn't be happier with the whole experience or more strongly recommend them and the LS brand.  Great value all the way around!

resp.text: Thank you Charles for shopping with us and buying local!

name: John King
text: Several of the reasons I recommend Columbiana Tractor. Their personality, products, prices and promotions.

name: Chaz Phil
text: Great place! On very short notice I needed a bushhog, they had what I needed and even delivered! Will definitely use again!

name: Jimmy Tolbert
text: Great group of guy!! Really great experience!

resp.text: Thank you for your business Jimmy!

name: Trey Garrett
text: I bought my tractor here and have been back for help with other items since then.  I shopped from Gardendale to Calera and back.  Nobody was as friendly and nobody gave me as much tractor for my dollar as these guys.  Stop by and just meet them if your thinking about a tractor or commercial lawn mowers.

resp.text: As always Trey, thank you for your business and kind words!

name: Norman Redo
text: Great place to buy a tractor

resp.text: Thanks You Norman!

name: rob dodd
text: Great place to buy a John Deere. Wes took care of most of the work over the phone, and i just had to show up, sign the papers and pick up my new John Deere! Friendly people and great service!

name: Boyd Patterson
text: Nice clean dealership, very friendly staff, always have my parts.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: JAMES PHILLIPS
text: Great people to do business with. About some parts there and they're very knowledgeable of the equipment I was working on.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Justin Pace
text: IT was great an very nice people an great service

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Johnny Tank
text: Great people and place

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Billy Robertson
text: First, my lawnmower only had 26 hours of usage, when the head gasket began to leak. Of course, this was not under warranty and the cost for repair is $284. Labor cost is $102 per hour. I dropped off my lawnmower on a Wednesday.  After calling to check on the status after a week, I was informed a few days later Of the total cost. And then took an additional two weeks for the repairs to be completed. In closing, it took 19 days to do two hours worth of work.  I was never notified nor updated.  When I picked up my lawnmower the only greeting I was met with was your total was $284.80. Terrible customer service, terrible communication and obviously an inferior product.

resp.text: Hi Billy --  we are very sorry you had a negative experience with our Florence dealership. Customer service is very important to us at TriGreen Equipment and we are going to forward these comments to management. We hope you'll consider giving us another try, please contact us directly at 256-233-0339 so we can work to make this right for you.

name: Scott Roysden
text:
Terrible service team !
I have a John Deere skid steer I took in with what seemed to be a hydraulic issue .
I left my machine in what I assumed would be capable hands .
After a few days I was told that it needed a pressure relief valve because the hydraulic pressure was low !!
Remember that statement while I write the rest of this review because it will come back to that !
The part came in and they told me it was ready . I drove an hr to pick up machine got in it and had the same issue as when I dropped it off .
Never got it on the trailer !!!
I left machine with them for yet another wrong diagnosis of bad hydraulic pump !
I got contacted that machine was ready so I picked it up . Still same issues but I needed it to continue with work . They had my machine for almost 2 weeks which is not a problem if I get back a fixed machine.
The repair cost was almost $4000 and machine was still the same as the day I took it .
So after a few weeks of trying the machine it never got better or worse so I knew I still had an issue !
I took it to a repair shop that I was referred to and after 3 hrs I got a call your machine is ready !!!
Exciting news and it was only a issue with computer it was stuck in a precision mode !!
Cost me $164 and the machine works great !!!
I called TRIGREEN and told them and they did absolutely nothing but tell me it needed the parts they installed! Remember the statement I referred to earlier ^ the next section tells you the answer !!

Now here is the kicker precision mode decreases hydraulic flow which was my issue and is exactly what TRIGREEN said but failed to check the obvious because they want to throw parts at your problem and run your bill up ! The parts they replaced was not necessary because it was just stuck in the wrong mode .
I have called corporate and they are sticking with the decision of the Florence store on not making this right .
I’m writing this to warn you off of using this company they are not customer service friendly and incompetent of working on the product they sale .
Hope this helps the next customer with there decision on buying or using this store for anything!!!

resp.text: Hi Scott -- we are certainly very sorry to hear that your experience with TriGreen has left you feeling angry and frustrated. We understand that we are not the intended audience for your review, but we value your feedback, nonetheless. Providing exceptional customer service is very important to us, and when we miss the mark with even one customer, we like to take it as an opportunity to improve. We stand by the work performed by our service departments, but we will communicate your comments to management and work with them to ensure our technicians are being effective and efficient in diagnosing and repairing our customers' equipment. We are very sorry that we seem to have lost your business, but most importantly we are very happy to hear that your skid steer is back in operation. If ever you want to discuss this further, feel free to contact us directly at 256-233-0339.

name: Charles Hammond
text: All the equipment you'll ever need.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!

name: Jon Goggans
text: Good folks there.  Young man named Will treated me right. But they are all good.  Friendly and competent!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Phillip Risner
text: Friendly service very helpful!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Bobby Carr
text:
Sales team was helpful and knowledgeable,
Very good experience

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jim Brewer
text: Great service

resp.text: Thank you Jim!

name: River Lafloor
text: Got to go green end of discussion. Great customer service and staff.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Shane Haddock
text: Friendly service with a smile and have about what ever it is you need for your lawn and garden

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Connie Gist
text: Got the right lawnmower blades for my John Deere riding mower . Now we can mow the grass.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: D Fre
text: Friendly staff. They were short handed today but I was treated with respect and fairness. The salesman took the time to answer my questions and was knowledgeable about the product.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Heather Hall
text: Don't buy the extra insurance. Doesn't cover anything. They have a $125 fee for cleaning their tools between jobs. $100 pick up/drop off fee they state when you call is actually $150 and they will hold your equipment till you pay it.

resp.text: Hi Heather - We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience at our dealership, and for that, we apologize.  Providing you with an exceptional visit is very important to us and we'd love to hear more about your time with us so we can make it right. Please call our Customer Service Manager at 256-233-0339 so we can continue to earn the right to your business.

name: Vince Barnett
text: Knowledgeable and friendly and nothing runs like a Deere!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Peggy Smith
text: Called after 2 wks, not sure what to do, calling corporate to see if new deck was needed, called a wk later, sending it to Lowe's the next day, not there, call back almost a week later, still not there,  called TriGreen, oh they forgot to haul it back to Lowe's (grrr), come get it when we're open in two more days.  Not Happy!!  Hope it works now.

resp.text: Hi Peggy - we're so sorry to hear about your experience at our Florence dealership! Providing you with a great customer experience is extremely important to us and we are going to forward these comments to management. If you'd be willing, please call our Customer Service Manager at 256-233-0339 so we can learn more and continue to earn your business. Thanks!

name: Ryan Wells
text: This place is a joke. It’s hard to believe that people can be this slow. If you go in for a screw driver it will be 30 min minimum.

resp.text: Hi Ryan - providing an exceptional customer experience is very important to us, which means we care about your feedback. We hope you'll consider giving us another try, please contact our Customer Service Manager at 256-233-0339 so we can work to make this right for you.

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: Great place to find all your John Deere needs

resp.text: Thank you Kim!

name: Larry Littrell
text: I was given fast service, they had the part on hand.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Mark Parker
text: After a little bit of a slow start, the staff did a great job of making me welcome, and helping me with a purchase.  Will be back.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback Mark!

name: Terry Haddock
text: The best place for parts for you tractor or mower

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kenneth McCormack
text: New lawnmower tore up and they didn't make it right

resp.text: Hi Kenneth - providing an exceptional customer experience is very important to us, which means we care about your feedback. We hope you'll consider giving us another try, please contact our Customer Service Manager at 256-233-0339 so we can work to make this right for you.

name: Robert Pastuszka
text: Staff wasn't very helpful and were quick to dismiss me, then they said I would hear back from them later this afternoon regarding the status of my mower, and nobody called.

resp.text:
Robert,
We're so sorry for the delay on the status of your mower. We've followed up with our staff regarding your situation. You should hear from them today but if not, or if you'd like to discuss your experience further, please feel free to call us at 256-233-0339 . Thanks for your feedback as it helps us to continually improve not only our service but the overall experience we offer our customers.

name: Thrash Forge
text: Always have what i need

resp.text: Thank you!

name: John Lard
text: Very helpful and friendly service

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Gerald French
text: Excellent Service as always

resp.text: Thanks Gerald!

name: SWE Inc.
text: Fast unloading

resp.text: Thank you for feedback!

name: Larry Hyvonen
text: Great

resp.text: Thank you Larry!

name: Clay Harris
text: Very expensive yet worth it

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Justin Kelley
text: Great hardware store. Support your local small business.

name: Alan Farwell
text: Johnny and sUzanne are quite helpful.  Country style friendly.  Great deals

name: marvin ball
text: Great people been doing business with them for years

name: M. Alan Free
text: Great service and knowledgeable staff. Top notch warrantee services.

name: Cullman Customer
text: This place was really good until Philip stole the company away from H.C. He is a crook and has tried to steal my money. I brought an item in for warranty work and decided upon himself to do non-warranty work with out calling me first. Went to pick un my item and had this huge bill. Johnny has always been honest with me and I feel bad for him and the other employees there. I will never go back. Too bad I can not leave zero stars.

name: Bobbie Wilson
text: I am glad I did not read reviews first. I purchased a new cub cadet in spring of this year. I asked Johnny a lot of questions, he answered them all and correctly.I had already done my homework on what I wanted. I left to go look elsewhere hoping for a lower price instead I went straight to the bank. I came back and purchased from 157 hardware. I was treated with respect and not like a dumb female. I love these guys and will be going back.

name: Joseph Murphy
text: The worst customer service ive ever had to deal with in my life.  I was treated in a rude manner and the old heavy set guy is the worst.

name: J Kincer
text: I purchased several items there for 3 years☝️I needed a $40 drive belt for my Cub cadet lawnmower which they didn’t have in stock 😒and instead of just ordering it for me I had to make a 35 minute roundtrip drive there and pay for it first 😐 need to trust faithful customers. Bad business!

name: Richard Martin
text: Lazy people, especially the one they call Bear, good eater, lousy for helping get the parts you need. Expects customer to provide part numbers, he cannot look them up on system. STAY AWAY.

name: John Converse
text: Friendly & courteous service.  I was pointed in the exact right direction to get the items I needed.  I will definitely go back again.

name: Bob Schlink
text: Use to be a good place but the mower repair person is one of the rudest people I have ran into in awhile. I reckon the hardware store is alright as you can help yourself but if you are looking for lawn equipment I would suggest going somewhere else because you sure won't get it serviced here.

name: James Goeller
text: Nice people very helpful

name: Cyrus H. Bearden
text:
Bad business practices... instead of doing what the customer asks for,  they will go far beyond the agreed scope of work and replace many items you didn't ask for causing an outrageous and unexpected bill to pay.... they don't call the customer for approval,  they just replace items without consulting with you first....
Buyer beware

name: Paul cox
text: Came in trying to find an ignition switch for my zero turn and the tech was so lazy he wouldnt even compare it to their inventory to see if he could match it.

name: Steve Townsend
text: The older gentleman, I think he was the owner was rude and unhelpful. The young lady at the counter that help me was excellent.

name: John Farr
text: Great selection of bolts, both American and metric.

name: Eddleman Stump Grinding
text: The best...,friendly ....,helpful,...local hardware business.

name: Larry Wood
text:
Not very pleased at all. When we dripped the lawnmower off, told them not to put a lot of money into it, the mechanic promised he wouldn't spend a lot on it. 2 weeks later went to pick it up and found out that they had bought a whole lawnmower just to put a new front end on ours. 700 dollars to fix a 50 dollar lawnmower. Never a call to us to approve that kind of fix. We could have bought a brand new one for that price.
Seems as though they take advantage of elderly people.
Wish I could choose negative stars.

name: Jim Glimpse
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable. Family and locally owned.

name: Randy Nelson
text: Great place friendly fokes everything to fix household projects!!!!!!!

name: Tim Black
text: Place to find parts nobody else has

name: Robby Culver
text: Great family atmosphere and Hardware that you need

Muy buenas herramientas. Saludos..

name: steven k
text: Best tractor parts dealer in the area.  Has shop services too but I haven't used them.  Just cantankerous enough to make you appreciate the way parts businesses used to be run.  If he doesn't have what you need he can get it in a few days.  Very knowledgeable about both old and new machinery.

name: Penny McGarity
text: Great. They had everything and then some to fix our old tractor.. I wouldn't want a new tractor when our old tractor can be fixed.. And everyone there are so nice..

name: Josh Harris
text: Great place to find knowledge and parts for older tractors.

name: John Doe
text: the friendliest place I have ever shopped at, I wish tall shops was as friendly as this one I will definitely go back! I am so glad to bring old tractors back to life rather than having to buy a new one!

name: Brad “Doughboy” Copeland
text: Donald at Jayne's knows alot about tractors

name: Wade Hendrix
text: I bought over a thousand dollars in parts from them & decided to call back awhile later with a couple of questions.The guy got mad & told me."I gotta go" & hung up on me.Not the kind of thing you'd expect from a reputable dealer.Oh well.I searched online & found the parts I needed.

name: Wayne Thompson
text: Donald is the best

name: Shaun Dalton
text: My "go to" for my tractor parts!

name: Alvie Rodgers
text: They have pretty much everything I go there for. Wish they were open longer on Saturday

resp.text: Thank you Alvie!

name: Glenn Byrum
text: Great store to shop at.

resp.text: Thank you Glenn!

name: Tammy Ingrum
text: I bought a lawn mower from the Columbia store and I carried it back because I found out it had never been serviced before I bought it. It was used I paid $6500 for it. Told them the oil had not been changed and the blades were dull and it does not cut right. There are two ridges when you cut it. Went to pick it up they charged me $129.00 to sharpen my blades. Got it home oil still black and the ridges are worse. I feel.So ripped off. Never again will I buy anymore of their junk. I will be taking pictures and posting on Facebook.

resp.text: Hello, Tammy. We understand your frustration and anger. Please accept our apologies. If you'd like, you may call our corporate office at 256-233-0339 to speak with a corporate manager.

text: They provide excellent support to TriGreen

resp.text: Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you!

text: Service was great!! We love our tractor! Thanks so much!!

name: Ronald Sanks
text: I wouldn't shop for farm equipment anywhere else. Nice guy , works hard has built a top notch business. A trust worthy guy.

name: Rotimi Onaghise
text:
Worst service company I’ve had to deal with in my life.
No good customer service.
Took my tractor out there for repairs and the job was not done correctly. After 2 weeks of picking tractor and without any use it would not start up again. Jumped tractor and took it back to them to fix again. Fixed for the second time and they billed me for the second time. I complained and they got mad but I took my equipment away but equipment has not worked correctly since I took it away.

name: Melissa Greeson (SHUNSHINE)
text: Lots to be Questioned ?

text: Bought  new refrigerator from sears 4yrs ago. Have had to call for 2 years out and it quit again 2 weeks ago. Still waiting for them to come fix it. Clearly customers are not important to sears anymore. No wonder they are going belly up. They have forgotten who actualy pays thier bills. Not the shareholders....the customer. No customer no business.

name: Earcel Pierce
text: The service was not what l expected it to be because l was charged $179.00 for dryer not being fixed .it was the worse service call l have ever had from you all.

name: marie fischtziur
text: Jolette Fischtziur.  I just had repair for  a small part from my water hose to the connection  for the ice maker in my fridge. It to the repair person about 20 minutes  to  connect it. It cost $489.+  . This is awful. The repair person was kind,polite and professional, but if there is another company available  I will use them. Due to this  lock down I could not find  another company available.  The cost was to high. I tried to speak to someone at the repair center and the women was unwilling to listen to me and hung up. I was not rude.

name: Jennifer Killam
text: They never showed up but said they did, cameras don't lie...but will take your money

name: Ursula Lowe
text: This has nothing to do with the repair man. He was polite and very professional. However, I was appalled having to pay $131.50 for a service that did not require a part. Over the years I have spent so much money on appliances with Sears because I believed in Sears. I am giving it up, I will only buy cheap foreign things at least I don't feel taking advantage when the darn thing brakes down. I'll just get another one. This is were you could have increased business by showing you trust your products and if repairs are required after warranty the costs are reasonable. A $131.50 without parts, in my opinion, is unreasonable. Good luck for the future, without me!

name: Hugh B
text:
Horrible!!!  The first technician showed-up to repair my GAS range with no manometer (device to measure gas pressure), then tried to guess at the problem being related to the electronic ignition system.  Then, the second technician shows-up a week later with the manometer but with no adapters to check the gas line or the regulator pressure so just guesses it's probably the regulator.  But, the regulator he orders and delivered to my house is clearly the wrong part so I have to spend hours with their non-native English speaking customer service representatives to cancel the next service call and get a UPS pickup order to return the part.

Now SEARS is fighting my credit card dispute for all the charges including the wrong part that was returned over a week ago.   No wonder the company is having so much financial difficulty.

I WILL NEVER USE SEARS EVER AGAIN!

name: Mandy Hawsey
text: Was timely and prompt with service, but I will not use them again. Way overpriced for a simple repair. Felt completely ripped off.

name: T Herman
text: I had two services scheduled, Dishwasher and Washer and Dryer.  The first cancelled a week early and was rescheduled (dishwasher). The second after waiting 4 hours, as a no show called on the 5th hour to say they were running late and could they still come (washer & dryer), needless to say the answer was no.   The service provided for the dishwasher was great but the cancels and no shows are unacceptable.  Im not sure if the washer & dryer have been rescheduled, my wife is handling it.

name: Debbie Buford
text: Service was great.  Polite and helpful.

name: Mel Porter
text: Bad serivce

name: Ken McLeod
text: Came on time, was professional

name: Pat Williamson
text: My service was done by repair contract with sears.  At the time of repair approximately 2 weeks ago a part was replaced for the 3rd time that controls the starting up--running on.  NOW AS OF LAST NIGHT DISHWASHER WILL NOT START AGAIN--THE 4TH TIME.  IT HAS BLINKING LIGHTS AND THAT IS ALL.  I AM DISGUSTED!!!!

name: Paul Smith
text: Perfect in all aspects

name: Jim Van Matre
text: Excellent in EVERY WAY

name: Beverly McLeod
text: Did not fix problem. Charged to much!!!!!!!!!!!  Said they fixed it but didn't!

name: Margaret Middleton
text: Excellent...

name: Joshua Goodwin
text: The guys at the parts counter were dismissive and seemed uninterested in helping me find a solution for my problem. Would not listen to my explanation of what I needed before saying they don't have what I need. Wanting a simple pto driveshaft that I knew I would need to cut down and they just acted as though there was no way they could help. This place is good for nothing except talking down to new customers and making people feel like they are not needed for sales.. would give zero stars if I could.

resp.text: Hi Joshua -- we are very sorry to hear about your experience at our Leighton location. Customer service is very important to us and we are going to forward these comments to management, but we'd like to hear more about your experience so we can make it right. Please contact our Customer Service Manager directly at 256-233-0339.

name: Monica Petoskey
text: The parts people are super nice. Helpful to a lady. 😁 Just a good ol' country place! My husband was impressed with their service department... fast and reasonably priced.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: tim tanner
text:
Great selection & very knowledgeable staff!
I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: B wd
text: Sales and parts are great to work with. I would recommend anyone looking for a Deere to visit this store. Service......not so great. Not my business, but if it was I think I'd prioritize a little better and treat everyone the same no matter how large of an operation they run or their family name. If someone brings equipment to be worked on, there's most likely a problem. They could at least check and try to show a customer why they don't think there's a problem instead of blaming the customer or claiming misuse or talking behind the customer's back. I'm disappointed with what has been my dealer for 10 + years.

resp.text: Hi B wd - thanks for taking the time to leave us a review, your feedback is important to us. It appears our service department missed the mark on your last visit and we'd love to learn more. If willing, please call our Customer Service Manager at 256-233-0339 so we understand how to make it right and continue to earn your business. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Julie Nguyen Orlando
text: Just got a great deal on a 1023E from Patrick! Everyone was friendly and went out of their way to help us! Great buying experience, I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience!

name: Donald Reding
text: Great place to do business

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Gary Bolton
text: Friendly service

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Larry Nix
text: Always helpful

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Benito Garcia
text: Fast and courteous. Quick to unload John Deere attachments.. Trucker approved 💯!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: John Collum
text: It was close to closing time I understand that,but your salesman actually referred another company.

resp.text:
Hi John -- thank you for taking the time to leave a review. Providing an exceptional customer experience is very important to us, which means we care about your feedback.
We are going to forward these comments to management but would love to learn a little more about your experience so we can work to make this right for you and continue to improve our customer service for existing and future customers. If you'd be willing, please contact our Customer Service Manager at 256-233-0339. We look forward to hearing from you. Thanks again.

name: Ha Ha
text: Great place to shop for a Deere! Always busy and competitive. Can't go wrong!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Tommy
text: Very nice place. Very friendly folks. Clean indoors. Lots of JD tractors ro choose from, lawnmowers and lawn and garden tractors also. Answered my questions with a friendly smile..

resp.text: Thank you for the compliments, we appreciate your business!

name: Jimmie Hall
text: Took my riding lawn mower in, they came out, looked, unloaded it and very polite and efficient.

resp.text: Thank you.

text: Always great service,only place that I buy my farm equipment at,plus service and parts.

resp.text: Thank you!!

resp.text: Thank you!

Love this place.
They always have what I need for my lawnmower which is a lot and very often.

resp.text: Thank you!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Brad “Doughboy” Copeland
text: I had to go get some parts for the boss so we can fix our pickers so we can get boss's soybeans out of the fields and Tri-Green had what we needed without having to order it and we being down for another two or three days or even a week

resp.text: Thank you Brad for your feedback!

name: Jay Bolton
text: Getting tractor worked on again for the umpteenth time for it to only have 300 hours.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Brenda Abernathy
text: No Service

resp.text: Hi Brenda - we are very sorry you had a negative experience with us. Customer service is very important to us. Please contact us directly at 256-233-0339 so we can work to make this right for you. We hope you'll consider giving us another try.

name: Thomas Burden
text: Great people !!! Well satisfied !!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kevin Taylor
text: Overpriced for sure

name: James Morgan
text: Good people friendly atmosphere and if something goes wrong with anything they stand behind their warranty with no trouble

name: Nathaniel White
text: Great place. Good people.

name: Terry M. Slaton
text: I purchased my Bad Boy Mower from them in 2011 and got a really good deal.  They are friendly and helpful and I have sent two friends to their store who wanted a Bad Boy.  My deck lift actuator failed and I bought a replacement part from them today. The service was great and they provide help in answering my questions about installation of the part.  Hood place to do business.

name: Steve Roemer
text: KRUSTER that works under the stair case needs to retire as door greeter he is horrible at sitting on his can telling a potential boat buyer its a ""sellers market and we ANIT GOT no Boats"" like never buy a boat here they don't need buiness.

name: James Sanders
text: I ordered a starter for YM1700 on Wednesday afternoon. They shipped a new one to me and by noon the next morning it was on my tractor. Great service and unbeatable price and shipping.                  I ended up getting a complete overhaul to my YM1700. Brandon, the shop manager scheduled me a time to be there. The shop took me in and Jessie and Barry did a complete overhaul this morning and I was gone by noon. The tractor runs like a new one and looks a lot better too. All these guys are pros with a down home personality. It is great  to do business with a shop that cares about their customers. This tractor may outlast me and I may not get to see these guys much but you can be assured if I do need tractor work, this will be the place I turn to and I will recommend them to all my friends in need of their services.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, James!

name: Mike Wallace
text:
Bought a new Mahindra 4540 from them Saturday. They delivered today. Buying experience was flawless and pleasant. Dan the Tractor Man is one fine fella. If I have any nit to pick at all, is that it wasn't delivered with a full tank of fuel.
I will be back, I have more implements to buy once I figure out what I can't live without.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Mike! It was great working with you!

name: Tommy Harkins
text: I had a great experience with Rob and all the guys at the Hartselle, Alabama location. They had all the parts I needed to get my Yanmar YM 1700 tractor. The Tractor is up and running like a well oil machine. Thanks guys for all your help.

name: Russell Townsend
text: Is there a 30-minute excellent service and very courteous

name: Kim Bryant
text:
These guys and gals are great. The top notch customer service starts when you call about whatever you need. They will go above and beyond to help make your experience with them the best it can be.
I have a Bad Boy mower that I purchased at a chain store. When I needed blades for said mower, I had just watched their commercial. I called to see if they had what I needed in stock. They were getting a shipment at that exact time.
Normally a business will get the product on the shelf before they consider it in stock. These guys sent someone to get on the truck and find as many options for me as possible. They had every blade I could use. This was the first set of blades I had ever purchased. Instead of trying to "sell up", they taught me what each set was for. They wanted to make sure I was well informed on my blades. I asked them why and they said "Knowledge about your purchase will make you a better owner, and you will take better care of it because you now have skin in the game or so they say."
If you want the full  old timey correct customer experience, Fredricks is your place. If you just want to run in and run out, they are still your place. Because next time you go in, you will remember how they helped you to have a speedy checkout.
You will NOT be dissatisfied. This place is built for the experience.

resp.text: Wow, Kim. Thank you very much for your kind words! We'll always do what we can to serve our customers. It's a pleasure doing business with you!

name: Nathan Whitfield
text: Great service and good little yanmar tractors

resp.text: Thank you, Nathan!

name: yahi garcia
text: Rude people I called and asked to speak to someone in spanish there response was this is not mexico Obviosly not A simple we dont have anyone that speaks spanish would of been perfectly fine I am not one to write anything bad on reviews but just because of how rude this person was i decided to share it never will i order from these people again

resp.text:
Hi Heidy,

I'm very sorry for the employee's response. It was totally uncalled for and it's completely inexcusable. We don't condone this type of behavior at all.

If I can be of any assistance at all, please feel free to reach out to me at admin@fredricksequipment.com. I would be happy to personally handle your parts requests, if you'd like.

name: barbara malone
text: Very helpful staff! Makes you feel welcomed.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Barbara!

name: Clinton Russell
text:
They got all the parts you ever need for
Yanmar tractors

resp.text: Thank you, Clinton!

name: Cody Depew
text: Got my tractor from there and have great conserts

resp.text: Thank you for the rating, Cody!

name: Garey Shedd
text: Nice people they treat u wright

resp.text: Thanks Gary!

name: kbharrell gm
text: Great food,fast

name: rodney vanalstine
text: They are always ready and willing and able to help do what needs doing.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Rodney!

name: Gerald Crofutt
text: I went to their maintenance side thinking the sold John Deere parts as that's where Google said on my search.  They asked the maintenance dept. and they said no.  So I accomplished nothing, but not their fault.

resp.text:
Hi Gerald,

Thanks for your feedback. Unfortunately, we cannot provide parts for many John Deere products due to OEM blocks placed on those parts. However, we do offer parts for many John Deere tractors with Yanmar engines, such as the John Deere 750, 850, 950, and 1050. We appreciate your visit and hope we can serve you in the future!

name: Kay Farley
text: Had exactly what we needed and affordable

resp.text: Thank you Kay.

name: J Carter
text: Firsr Class the best PERIOD. Thanks 4 all

resp.text: Thank you!

name: tim N michele Davis
text: Good people to deal with

name: Ronald Stevens
text: A lot of tractors

name: Glenn Byrum
text: Awesome place for fun.

name: Nancy Barnett
text: Has alot of choice

resp.text: Thank you Nancy!

name: James Owen
text: Ripoff

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Owen,

We're always looking for feedback. Please feel free to contact me at admin@fredricksequipment.com to let me know what we did, or didn't do, to earn your rating. I look forward to your reply.

name: Rhonda Hicks
text: Customer service is excellent and Mr. Narrell is so friendly and helpful. He is always great about answering any questions and explaining them so you can understand.

name: Nanna Moates
text: Very friendly. knowlegable and helpful.

name: Tj Moore
text: Great place to buy  tractor parts.

name: Jay Mostella
text:
Purchased a tractor a couple weeks ago. Tractor is exactly what Mark said it is. Had a couple of small issues and they took care of them promptly and wirhout question. I am very glad that i purchased from them.

Mark came across rather gruff at first but is actually a very nice person and a man of integrity.  I would recommend you check them out if you are looking for a new used tractor or tractor parts... I rarely review stores but feel they deserve it...

name: Donna Rippy
text: Had exactly what we needed and very nice people!  We will be back if we need more antique tractor parts!

name: Larry Kirkland
text: Good parts reasonable

name: Carol Thomason
text: Ladies, have a man go to get anything. They'll tell you they'll call when you can pick something up, but, for some odd reason, _none_ of the 3 numbers you gave them, _all_ of which have voicemail, worked, so they sell it to a man. Second time I have been shafted by them, after family and friends doing business for years. I'll no longer refer new business.

name: Bruce Roberson
text: Great people to deal with

name: Kenneth Plunkett
text: Great

name: David Woods
text: Awesome

name: Lloyd Nickell
text: Great people

name: Robbie Tidwell
text: My tractor went in the middle of cutting hay the Friday before Memorial Day.  Norman and the Management went beyond the call of duty to provide parts and service to get me going.  What Norman did will not be forgotten, great man and great service.  Thankful we still have people like Norman.

resp.text: I relayed this message to Norman and it made his day!  Thanks for sharing this review and we hope to see you soon!

name: H Wayne Orr
text: Selling Kubota parts for less and very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you, we appreciate your business and your kind words.

name: MO Mules
text: Not very nice.  Expect to pay in full for anything they order in. Lack of trust that you will buy it.  Expect to be out of pocket when they put something together wrong and it needs new parts when its brand new.

resp.text:
I'm sorry you had a issue, wish we could have spoke about it in person. We ask people to pay for items we order, because we have to pay for them. If you have an issue I would love to discuss it, call me at 256-332-0356 and maybe we can fix your issue.

Bryan Scott

name: Jack Brooks
text: i like tracors

resp.text: Thank you, Jack.  We like tractors too and it is great to have you as a customer!

name: Randy Knight
text: Excellent customer service!  Norman in parts took the time to ensure he ordered the correct part and went the extra mile to get my part to me when it arrived. Strongly recommend!

name: Joel Stephenson
text: These are great folks to do business with!  Thank you for the great service after the sale!

name: William McMullan
text: Good service on our Kabota ATV's.

name: Timothy Campbell
text: Nice friendly people

name: Danny Terrell
text: Nice and friendly service

name: James Rice
text: The service you get is great

name: Shawn Albert
text: Had a great customer service experience here. Staff went out of their way to help out. To top it off, I got a good price on a new tractor.

resp.text: Shawn, we had such an incredible time working with you to get a new tractor. It means the world to us to see this amazing review! Looking forward to seeing you again soon. -Mike M., General Manager

name: Tammie Cooley
text: Great selection of tractors, lawn mowers, stihl products, Kubota products, walker mowers - they have great sales team and financing with zero down if  needed! Always willing to help find the perfect equipment you need

name: David A
text: Helpful staff as always, but it was hard to Maintain 6'  and look for a leaf blower. Only got a two  of 5 stars because no employees were wearing a mask. Bought my Leaf blower at Ace Hardware because all their employees were wearing masks. We all have a choice on where and how to shop, I just did not get a comfortable feeling there during this pandemic. Respectfully, David ( I love my new Stihl leaf blower )

resp.text: David, we're upset to hear you didn't stick around to grab a leaf blower from us. We understand your concern with the current pandemic, and our crew is doing everything they can to adjust to state mandates and guidelines. However, this shouldn't stop us from showing you our well-known standards of great service. We hope you can return soon to chat with us about anything else you need. We'd love for a second chance. Thanks! -Mike M., General Manager

name: Tyler Atkisson
text: Knowledgeable staff, quick repairs and loads of inventory

resp.text: Tyler, thank you for your kind thoughts and your review rating. Sometimes we  fall short in some ways, but we keep trying to improve as a dealership. Mike McGlothlin, General Manager.

name: Tom Parker
text: Great people. Service Dept is excellent. Highly recommend as a go to dealer for Kubota equipment and service.

resp.text: Tom, happy you could stop by! Looking forward to the next time you make it our way. Mike M., General Manager

name: Kenneth Kendrick
text: not very friendly service.

resp.text: Kenneth, it's truly upsetting to hear about your recent visit as we always work hard to make sure you feel welcome here. If you would care to explain which department and time and circumstances of your visit it may help in our team's development moving forward . We'd love to work with you again to make things right. -Mike M., General Manager

name: Stephen Newell
text: Service department was outstanding and very respectful.  Waiting to see how the repairs go and what the bill is going to be. They were going to get to work within a couple days.

name: blessed7fold
text: Beware: These guys will jerk you around on price.

resp.text: Sorry that you feel that way. If you would like, you can contact me(Steve) and we can work to resolve the issue.

name: jimmy smith
text: Frendly, very helpful people at the counter.

name: wayne bigbee
text: RUDE!!! I CALLED WITH QUESTION AND FELT SORT OF LIKE I WAS TAKING SOMEONES TIME THAT HAD BETTER ZHINGS TO DO.

resp.text: Sorry you feel that way but if its a service Question feel free to call and ask for Billy. I would be glad to help you sir.

name: emmanuelwillis
text: I purchased a loader from Talladega Tractor a couple months back and what can I say other than these guys are great! My salesman (John Parks) was very friendly and helpful with the loader purchasing process. The staff were very friendly as well and knowledgeable about the product. I will most certainly be driving two hours past my local Kubota dealer to Talladega Tractor for my next big Kubota purchase!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!!

name: Beverly Hughes
text: Nice people!

resp.text: We're grateful for you taking a moment to show your support, Beverly! We'd love to welcome you back our way again soon. -Mike M., General Manager

name: redhot recycling
text: Great experience on a used Kubota. Were also very fair on a trade. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!!

name: Buddy Parker
text: The Service Department provided the requested services in a fair, friendly and prompt manner.

resp.text: Thank you for using Talladega Tractor

name: Marcus Tillman
text: Good people.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving this review, Marcus! Hoping we'll see you again. -Mike M., General Manager

name: Stacy Brand
text: Great guys to buy from if you need a tractor, lawn mower, or chainsaw.

name: Brian Mosley
text: Great place, amazing customer service. This crew goes above and beyond the call of duty. My Uncle and I made our first visit last year just to look around and browse the inventory, not sure if he was going to buy anything or not, really to just have something to do. From that very moment on it's like visiting family...... The good kind. Lol. Shelley, Mike, Steve, and everyone else, I thank you for your time and kindness. No matter how busy they are, they will make sure you're happy and all questions are answered.

name: Ronnie Denney
text: Great people.  Friendly,  very helpful.

name: Brian Mosley
text: Great place, amazing customer service. This crew goes above and beyond the call of duty. My Uncle and I made our first visit last year just to look around and browse the inventory, not sure if he was going to buy anything or not, really to just have something to do. From that very moment on it's like visiting family...... The good kind. Lol. Shelley, Mike, Steve, and everyone else, I thank you for your time and kindness. No matter how busy they are, they will make sure you're happy and all questions are answered.

name: Bobby Tidwell
text: Not friendly act like they don't care help with your needs

name: Jerry Walton
text: good trip.

name: Derrick Huey
text: Good selection on Kubota tractors

name: Michael Willis
text: They ordered the part I needed as well as loaded me a brand new tiller for my tractor.   If you are in the need for a tractor, I'd suggest you go see the guys down at Talladega tractor.

name: John Spears
text: Can't comment on the sales crew but the service dept is outstanding! They are very knowledgeable and helpful!

name: Tommy Ivey
text: Took cub cadet in to have plastic fan on right transmission repaired. Decided to get tune up since it would be there. Was told a week for repair and tune up. 15 days later got it back. Service manager said all work was on sale at 10% off. Tune up was $160 .  Replaced 2 spark plugs,oil,fuel  and air filter plus oil. Rediculous charge. Fan was $30 and labor for complete job wad $260.80. Once again rediculous. Car dealers are not this exspensive. On top of that first time i cut grass the left mower spindle is bad. Had no issues with it before. Big time rip off. Never go there again. Kept it 15 days for 3.26 hrs of work. No im sorry or anything. Done with them. They charge $80 an hr. to work on a lawn mower.

name: Chris East
text:
Don't think because your a loyal customer they will treat you better I learned the hard way last Thursday 3-29-18 I've bought a exmark quest zero turn mower , stihl 391 chain saw and a stihl fs 91 weed eater I was looking to buy a new exmark zero turn mower the raduis was what I was looking at first off they wouldn't budge on the price then lied and said exmark only offered 42 month financing well I know for a fact that's a lie cause I went to another place and bought one and got 48 months financing they get a bigger kick back off of 42 months sure I know I've not spent a $100,000 on a tractor but when I needed something I never hesitated to go to them and buy that will not happen again
B&R tractor in Linville gave me a great deal on a mower and they are not the only people who sell stihl products they don't care about the person just how much money they can squeeze out of you shop around before you buy

name: Darryl Pairodocs
text: I purchased Kubota and Case tractors from them over the last couple of years and I am very happy with the products and services offered by them. I consider myself hard to please.

name: Chastity Bonner
text: Was awesome !!!!   Friendly staff, and very knowledgable of product !!!!

name: Greg Pepper
text: I bought 421Kubota zero turn lawnmower. Luke was outstanding in closing the deal deliver it with full tank gas and Kubota ball cap. Really enjoy the lawnmower and ball cap to. Give them 5 star for their service.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are glad you are happy. Please let us know if you need anything else!

name: allen tilley
text: The people are very friendly and always very helpful.

name: Ryne Gay
text: Good to do Business with. No problems.

resp.text: Ryne, thank you for your review! We appreciate your business and are glad you're happy. Please let us know if you need anything else.

name: David Cooley
text: Nice Crew Quick unloading.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Please let us know if you ever need anything.

name: Nick Freeman
text: I appreciate y'alls service.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! If you need anything else please let us know.

name: David Hart
text:
Driver came to pick up our yard machine for service (we were not at home).
It was in the driveway covered with tarp and tied with a rope
Came home to a neatly folded tarp and coiled  rope. Outstanding customer service!

name: David Goodrow
text: If you are looking for a tractor or just parts to repair yours, this is the place to go.

name: Benito Albarran
text: You get your   Parts quick in-and-out very professional people there I like it

name: Jared Toone
text: I recently bought a chainsaw here. They were helpful, explained everything well, got me an extended warranty for buying a six pack of Stihl oil, and the price was great. Also they were the only Stihl dealer open when I needed them. Good store.

name: Matt Tibbs
text: Good helpful people just a little pricey

name: Nick Strickland
text: Love doing business with these people

name: pako Silva
text: Best place for Chase and Kubota tractors and parts in North Alabama they also carry a full line of Stihl products and exmark mowers

name: David Phillips

text: If u are in the lawn mowing business u want to have reliable professianal maintenance on your equipment.   Mark provided quick diagnosis of my John Deere 115 so i could prepare for the coming season.  OUTSTANDING JOB!!

text: I called this morning to see if they had a part, said they were busy they took my number and said they'd call me back. I guess they didn't want my business.

name: C Ray Marilu S Beasley

name: G M
text:
Horrible Service Department!
After numerous attempts to get the service department on the phone, I finally got through and unfortunately decided to drop off my mower for repair.  A week and a couple follow-up calls later, they still don't know what is wrong with my mower.  A couple days later, I'm told it's the auto choke in the carb although there is a choke on the handle.  A few days later, they are still waiting on the Honda parts rep to call them back.  Next day, I'm promised an estimate; I hear nothing.  I call the next business day (Monday) when I'm told i will have an estimate by the end of the day, but I told them if I didn't hear back that afternoon (2+ weeks later), I was picking my mower and not paying the diagnostic fee.  Do you think I got a call?  Nope.  At least they're consistent. I picked up the broken mower the next day without paying.  I would avoid this place, for service, like the plague.

Also of note, they do not use computers to document your equipment's problem, part number, or your contact info; they use a small notebook.  While I'll appreciate simplicity, I expect a business to be organized--not this service department!

If I could give zero stars or even negative, since my mower carburetor gasket was ripped during diagnostics, I would.

name: Jackie H.
text: Great like always. Everyone is very pleasant and friendly.

resp.text: Jackie  thank you so much for your feedback. We appreciate your business.

name: eddie brown
text: Excellent service ... great experience at the service parts counter

resp.text: eddie , thank you so much for your review. We are happy to hear you were well taken care of at our store. Thank you for being a loyal SunSouth John Deere customer. We hope you will be joining us for our Open House at each location on March 2nd from 10-1. We will be giving away a John Deere Gator as well as other prizes. Thanks again!

name: A. Peaden
text: Enjoyed making a machinery  delivery there staff was exceedingly helpful and willing to go the extra mile to keep me moving

name: adam weber
text:
So on 11 Aug 18 I bought a JD riding mower (E100) from Lowes. Prior to this I physically visited SunSouth to purchase a mower but was told that I would need to go to a place like Lowes or Home Depot. I used my mower 3 times and noticed that the engine was leaking oil. On 29 Sep (when I noticed the leak), I called Lowes since I also purchased an extended warranty. They said that they would have someone come out to pick it up and that they would call the day before they were supposed to pick it up (scheduled for today 4 Oct) and give me a time. They were also supposed to call the day of pick up to let me know they were on the way.

Still haven't received a phone call and it it currently 4:21 pm. They close at 5 pm. My wife called Lowes back today at about 3:40 pm and they said they would contact them again and if we didn't hear from them that Lowes would call someone else.

Needless to say, I am NOT happy at all. I don't know about all of the other experiences, but so far mine is terrible. I will update if I get a call. Hopefully they can redeem themselves and get more than one star. I would give 0 stars if that were an option right now.

name: Brad Lee
text: They picked up my John Deere lawn tractor for servicing and brought it back to me when they finished. They did a good job on the repairs.

name: Mark
text:
I was having problems with my 2014 Dodge 6.7 diesel.  Stopped at City Diesel while traveling from Kentucky to Florida.  They are normally very busy but they got me in the shop and back on the road in just a few hours.  Highly recommend this company if you want top notch work.  My turbo actuator is working perfectly now since it was replaced. The truck pulls great and the exhaust brake works better than ever.
Big thanks to the crew at City Diesel!!

name: James Scarbrough
text: Quality work done in a timely manner.

name: John Blankenship
text: Awesome company to do business with..highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback! Let us know if we can do anything to help you.

name: John Bell II
text:
Outstanding work done on my 6.0, Bennett Clark, called and explained what work was done. He is very knowledgeable and explained my engine and it's repair in understandable terms.
I have been doing business with City Diesel since 1999, they know Diesel engines! They are very honest and reliable , great mechanical business. I can not say enough about them being trustworthy and reputable, I highly recommend City Diesel.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  We do appreciate hearing back from our customers.  I'll let Bennett know you were pleased.

name: Jane Smith
text: Were supposed to do an entire motor rebuild and instead replaced very few parts new resulting in an engine failure .. terrible costumer service.. just a plain rip off

resp.text: Jane Smith, is that the name you did business with us under?  I do not have any record of any transaction and we keep great records.  On the off chance that this is a real review under a pseudonym we keep excellent records and have a good warranty policy and any engine repair we did would be covered by warranty.   I would be happy to sit down with you and go over what was replaced and what warranty options you have.  Of course this would require this to be a legitimate review that has actually done business with us. Having only 3 reviews all of them one star and hundreds if not thousands of miles apart seems suspicious.  In the future I would recommend a more convincing fake name and maybe use a different profile for reviews in New York  and Alabama when you are leaving fictitious reviews.

name: Nicfin36
text: Jay did an awesome job fabricating a metal hydraulic line for my tractor. Top notch work. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We always enjoy feedback good or bad but it's especially nice to hear when we do a good job
